statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences;
SELECT organism_name, sequence FROM genetic_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, organism_name FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name LIKE 'E.coli%';
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT organism_name FROM genetic_sequences;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences WHERE organism_name = 'Human';
SELECT id, organism_name FROM genetic_sequences WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences WHERE sequence LIKE '%ATCG%';
SELECT id, organism_name, LENGTH(sequence) AS seq_length FROM genetic_sequences WHERE LENGTH(sequence) > 100 ORDER BY seq_length ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT organism_name FROM genetic_sequences ORDER BY organism_name ASC;
SELECT organism_name, species_name FROM Organisms;
SELECT * FROM Organisms WHERE organism_id = 1;
SELECT organism_name, research_date FROM Organisms JOIN Researches ON Organisms.organism_id = Researches.organism_id;
SELECT organism_name, research_notes FROM Organisms JOIN Researches ON Organisms.organism_id = Researches.organism_id WHERE organism_name = 'E. coli';
SELECT researcher_name, organism_name, research_date FROM Researches JOIN Organisms ON Researches.organism_id = Organisms.organism_id;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name, species_name FROM Organisms;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name, species_name, genetic_sequence FROM Organisms WHERE organism_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Researches WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT organism_name, research_date, research_notes FROM Organisms JOIN Researches ON Organisms.organism_id = Researches.organism_id;
SELECT research_id, researcher_name, organism_name FROM Researches JOIN Organisms ON Researches.organism_id = Organisms.organism_id ORDER BY research_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM organism;
SELECT name, species FROM organism WHERE id = 1;
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM gene ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT researcher, research_topic FROM research WHERE gene_id = 2;
SELECT id, gene_name, sequence FROM gene WHERE organism_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM organism WHERE species = 'Mammal';
SELECT gene_name, sequence FROM gene WHERE organism_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT research_topic, researcher FROM research WHERE gene_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND researcher LIKE '%Smith%';

SELECT organism.name, gene.gene_name, research.research_topic FROM organism JOIN gene ON organism.id = gene.organism_id JOIN research ON gene.id = research.gene_id WHERE organism.species = 'Plant' AND research.researcher = 'John Doe';

SELECT gene.id, organism.name AS organism_name, research.research_topic AS research_topic FROM gene JOIN organism ON gene.organism_id = organism.id JOIN research ON gene.id = research.gene_id WHERE organism.species = 'Bird' AND research.researcher != 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM Organisms;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name FROM Organisms WHERE organism_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT * FROM Sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchProjects JOIN Researchers ON ResearchProjects.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Organisms;
SELECT organism_id, organism_name FROM Organisms ORDER BY organism_id DESC;
SELECT Sequences.sequence_id, Sequences.sequence_data, Organisms.organism_name FROM Sequences LEFT JOIN Organisms ON Sequences.organism_id = Organisms.organism_id WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%ACGT%';

SELECT ResearchProjects.project_name, Researchers.researcher_name FROM ResearchProjects INNER JOIN Researchers ON ResearchProjects.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Organisms WHERE organism_type = 'Plant';
SELECT organism_name, organism_type FROM Organisms;
SELECT researcher_name, field_of_study FROM Researchers;
SELECT lab_name, location, lab_head FROM Laboratories;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date, experiment_result FROM Experiments;
SELECT gene_sequence, sequence_length FROM GeneSequences;
SELECT * FROM Organisms WHERE organism_type='Mammal';
SELECT organism_name, organism_type FROM Organisms ORDER BY organism_name DESC;
SELECT organism_name, genetic_sequence FROM Organisms WHERE organism_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT e.experiment_id, r.researcher_name, o.organism_name, e.experiment_date FROM Experiments e JOIN Researchers r ON e.researcher_id = r.researcher_id JOIN Organisms o ON e.organism_id = o.organism_id;
SELECT organism_name, gene_sequence, sequence_length FROM Organisms o JOIN GeneSequences g ON o.organism_id = g.organism_id WHERE sequence_length > 1000;
